# SEO Content Planner: PetPulse

**Generated by:** StratArts SEO Content Planner
**Date:** December 2025
**Business:** PetPulse - Smart Pet Health Monitoring

---

## Executive Summary

PetPulse's SEO strategy captures high-intent pet health searches through comprehensive educational content organized into topic clusters. The strategy targets problem-aware pet parents searching for symptom information and health guidance, positioning PetPulse as the trusted authority before introducing the product.

**Target Keywords:** 150+ keywords across 5 clusters
**Content Volume:** 12 posts/month, 144 posts/year
**Traffic Goal:** 100,000 organic visitors/month by Month 12

---

## Keyword Research

### Keyword Categories

| Category | Intent | Volume | Competition | Priority |
|----------|--------|--------|-------------|----------|
| Symptoms | Informational | Very High | Medium | P0 |
| Breed Health | Informational | High | Medium | P0 |
| Pet Vital Signs | Informational | Medium | Low | P0 |
| Pet Care/Wellness | Informational | High | High | P1 |
| Product/Solution | Commercial | Low | Low | P1 |
| Competitor | Commercial | Low | Low | P2 |

## Content Clusters

### Cluster 1: Dog Symptoms Guide

**Pillar Page:** "Complete Dog Symptom Guide: When to Worry and What to Do"
- 5,000+ words
- Covers 20+ common symptoms
- Links to all supporting content
- Conversion-optimized CTA

| 2 | 12 | Vital signs + more symptoms | Heart rate, temperature, shaking |

|-------|-------|-------|----------|

| 5 | 12 | More breeds + symptoms | Additional breeds, more symptoms |
| 6 | 12 | Pet tech + comparisons | Monitors, telehealth, comparisons |

### Month 7-12: Scale & Optimize

| Month | Posts | Focus |
|-------|-------|-------|
| 7-9 | 36 | Long-tail keywords, content updates |
| 10-12 | 36 | New clusters, seasonal content |

## On-Page SEO Guidelines

### Article Structure

```
[H1] Primary Keyword + Benefit
│
├── Introduction (hook + what you'll learn)
│   └── Table of Contents
│
├── [H2] What Is [Symptom/Topic]?
│   └── Definition, overview
│
├── [H2] Causes of [Symptom/Topic]
│   ├── [H3] Cause 1
│   ├── [H3] Cause 2
│   └── [H3] Cause 3
│
├── [H2] When to Worry
│   ├── Warning signs
│   └── Emergency indicators
│
├── [H2] What to Do
│   ├── Home care
│   └── When to see vet
│
├── [H2] How PetPulse Helps (soft pitch)
│   └── Relevant feature tie-in
│
├── [H2] FAQs
│   └── Related questions (schema)
│
└── Conclusion + CTA
```

### SEO Checklist

**Title Tag:**
- [ ] Primary keyword first
- [ ] Under 60 characters
- [ ] Compelling click reason

**Meta Description:**
- [ ] Include keyword naturally
- [ ] Under 155 characters
- [ ] Call to action

**Headers:**
- [ ] H1 includes primary keyword
- [ ] H2s include secondary keywords
- [ ] Logical hierarchy

**Content:**
- [ ] 2,000+ words for pillar pages
- [ ] 1,500+ words for supporting
- [ ] Keyword in first 100 words
- [ ] Keyword density 1-2%
- [ ] Natural language, not stuffed

**Internal Linking:**
- [ ] Link to pillar page
- [ ] Link to related articles
- [ ] Descriptive anchor text
- [ ] 3-5 internal links minimum

**Images:**
- [ ] Alt text with keywords
- [ ] Compressed for speed
- [ ] Descriptive file names

**Schema Markup:**
- [ ] FAQ schema where applicable
- [ ] Article schema
- [ ] Organization schema (site-wide)

---

## Link Building Strategy

### Link Building Priorities

| Tactic | Effort | Impact | Priority |
|--------|--------|--------|----------|
| Guest posting | Medium | High | P0 |
| Resource link building | Low | Medium | P0 |
| Pet blogger outreach | Medium | Medium | P1 |
| HARO/journalist queries | Low | High | P0 |
| Expert roundups | Low | Medium | P1 |
| Broken link building | Medium | Medium | P2 |

### Link Building Targets

**Pet Industry Publications:**
- PetMD (high DA, competitive)
- The Spruce Pets
- American Kennel Club
- Rover Blog
- BarkPost

**General Publications:**
- Health/wellness sections of news sites
- Technology publications (for pet tech angle)
- Business publications (startup angle)

### Linkable Asset Ideas

1. **Original Research:** "State of Pet Health Anxiety 2026" survey
2. **Infographics:** Dog vital signs visual guide
3. **Tools:** "Should I call the vet?" interactive quiz
4. **Data Studies:** Analysis of pet health trends
5. **Expert Guides:** Vet-authored content series

---

## Technical SEO

### Site Architecture

```
petpulse.com/
├── /blog/
│   ├── /symptoms/
│   │   ├── dog-not-eating/
│   │   ├── dog-vomiting/
│   │   └── ...
│   ├── /vital-signs/
│   │   ├── dog-heart-rate/
│   │   └── ...
│   ├── /breeds/
│   │   ├── golden-retriever-health/
│   │   └── ...
│   └── /wellness/
│       └── ...
├── /resources/
│   ├── symptom-guide/
│   ├── vital-signs-guide/
│   └── breed-encyclopedia/
└── /product/ (commercial pages)
```

### Technical Checklist

- [ ] Mobile-responsive design
- [ ] Page speed <3 seconds
- [ ] HTTPS enabled
- [ ] XML sitemap submitted
- [ ] Robots.txt configured
- [ ] Canonical tags implemented
- [ ] Structured data markup
- [ ] Core Web Vitals passing

### Page Speed Optimization

| Element | Target | Action |
|---------|--------|--------|
| LCP | <2.5s | Optimize images, CDN |
| FID | <100ms | Minimize JavaScript |
| CLS | <0.1 | Reserve space for images |
| Total size | <2MB | Compress assets |

## Content Performance Metrics

### Primary Metrics

| Metric | Month 3 | Month 6 | Month 12 |
|--------|---------|---------|----------|
| Organic traffic | 15,000 | 40,000 | 100,000 |
| Indexed pages | 40 | 80 | 150 |
| Ranking keywords | 200 | 500 | 1,500 |
| Page 1 rankings | 20 | 60 | 150 |
| Backlinks | 50 | 150 | 400 |
| Domain authority | 20 | 30 | 40 |

### Content Performance KPIs

| KPI | Target |
|-----|--------|
| Average time on page | 4+ minutes |
| Bounce rate | <60% |
| Pages per session | 2+ |
| Conversion rate (blog) | 2% |
| Email signups | 5% of traffic |

### Tracking Setup

**Google Search Console:**
- Track impressions, clicks, CTR
- Monitor indexing status
- Identify opportunities

**Google Analytics:**
- Traffic by page
- User behavior
- Conversion tracking

**SEO Tools:**
- Ahrefs or Semrush for rankings
- Keyword tracking
- Competitor monitoring

---

## Competitor Content Analysis

### Top Organic Competitors

| Competitor | DA | Traffic Est. | Content Focus |
|------------|-----|--------------|---------------|
| PetMD | 85 | 15M/mo | Medical conditions |
| AKC | 80 | 8M/mo | Breed information |
| The Spruce Pets | 75 | 5M/mo | General pet care |
| Rover | 70 | 3M/mo | Pet services |
| Hill's Pet | 65 | 2M/mo | Nutrition, health |

### Content Gap Analysis

**Topics Competitors Rank For That We Don't:**
- Specific conditions (diabetes, cancer, allergies)
- Diet and nutrition deep dives
- Training and behavior
- Pet insurance comparisons

**Our Content Advantages:**
- Pet technology focus (unique)
- Vital signs expertise (differentiated)
- Telehealth content (growing)
- AI/monitoring education (novel)

## Summary

### SEO Strategy Pillars

| Pillar | Pages | Traffic Potential |
|--------|-------|-------------------|
| Dog Symptoms | 15+ | 50K/month |
| Vital Signs | 10+ | 15K/month |
| Breed Health | 20+ | 20K/month |
| Wellness | 10+ | 10K/month |
| Pet Tech | 8+ | 5K/month |

### Year 1 SEO Goals

| Goal | Target |
|------|--------|
| Organic traffic | 100K/month |
| Ranking keywords | 1,500+ |
| Page 1 rankings | 150+ |
| Backlinks | 400+ |
| Blog → Trial conversion | 2% |
| Email signups | 3,000/month |

### Key Success Factors

1. **Volume** - Publish consistently (12/month minimum)
2. **Quality** - Best-in-class content for each keyword
3. **Authority** - Expert authors, vet review
4. **Technical** - Fast, mobile-friendly, well-structured
5. **Promotion** - Build links, social sharing
